about_the_game:
About

Kinstrife is a non-linear singleplayer medieval RPG with physically simulated combat – become a knight errant in tumultuous 13th-century Germany!

Journey through immersive landscapes filled with castles, monasteries, villages and forests. Travel with your sword at your side and your trusted retinue behind you, as you build up your skill, renown and wealth. Fight your way through realistic medieval battles, duels and sieges, rise up among the lords of the land and take part in tournaments to win fame and riches.

Our cutting-edge physically simulated combat system makes the impact of each swing count – weapons don’t simply clip through but instead deliver staggering blows, characters fall when losing their balance and horse charges knock down your opponents. Feel like you’re wielding a sword yourself, mastering your moves with various historical weapons: Each attack, feint or parry creates unique, interesting, natural situations – rewarding experimentation, different playstyles and replayability.

Key Features

  • Nonlinear open world: Immerse yourself into an atmospheric medieval world as you freely roam between unique historical locations.
  • Physically simulated combat: Become a master at the sword with cutting-edge physics animations, delivering unique impacts with each strike
  • Squire to knight: Create and train your own knight with skills and unique traits tailored to your play style. Prepare for battle with the finest arms, armors and garments of the time.
  • Writing history: Gain influence through battles, chivalry and strategic finesse, while building and leading a loyal retinue of supporters

Background

Transport yourself to 13th-century Germany during the turbulent period of the Great Interregnum. Amidst the power struggles among great houses vying for the imperial throne, the land is plagued by banditry and lawlessness. The Rhine, a crucial artery for commerce and travel, falls victim to a higher class of brigand - the Raubritter (robber barons). Exploiting their positions for wealth and power, they impose back-breaking tolls and engage in kidnapping to ransom those who dare traverse their territories.

To whom will you pledge your sword? Who will you welcome into your ascent to power, and who will dare to stand in your way?

short_description: Medieval strategy RPG with revolutionary physically simulated combat. Become a wandering knight, journeying to castles and towns in your quest for fortune & glory, fighting in battles & tournaments. Build your wealth, equipment & following - and carve out your destiny in a time of strife!
